item.title: EP 754 - Nelda
item.itunes:title: Nelda
item.description:
Today we start season 16 off with a bang by traveling to Dodow, Germany and search for sexy foxes, and then we investigate the truly horrifying story of Nelda Louise Hardwick!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

MERCH STORE!!!

https://tinyurl.com/y8zam4o2

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

"As Above" Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

“Alien Flyer” By TVP VT U

https://imgur.com/gallery/aPN1Fnw

 

Links:

http://www.emecklenburg.de/Mecklenburg/en/legends.htm

Nelda Louise Hardwick

Nelda Louise Hardwick

http://identifyla.lsu.edu/profile.php?id=186

The Doe Network:

Case File 1002DFLA

http://www.doenetwork.org/cases/1002dfla.html

Closing Song: "Humanity's December"
